Title: The Genoa Tip
Writer: Aaron Sorkin (created by), Aaron Sorkin (teleplay by), Dana Ledoux Miller (story), Adam R. Perlman (story), Aaron Sorkin (story by)
Actors: Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill
Plot: After running with what the team believes is an accurate tip backfires, delivering a heavy blow to their credibility.
